About Me

Welcome to my website!

BIO

Hi my name is Seth Adams. I graduated Virginia Tech in 2016 with a B.S. in Mechanical Engineering. I went on to be a Data Scientist at a startup doing research for medical devices. I spend most days programming in Python. My current work interests include machine learning, computer vision, and robotics.

Virginia Tech

Student/ Mechatronics Engineer

I spent a lot of time in a Mechatronics Lab during my undergrad. If you want to see some projects I did as a student, then check out Ned the robot and haptic feedback in the portfolio section.

Cardinal Mechatronics

Data Scientist

I mainly worked on two research projects while at Cardinal. They are non contact respiration and neonatal abstinence syndrome. NCR involved segmentation using computer vision. NAS dealt with building neural networks on motion and audio data.
